TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDebugConvert

summary.span: 定義將資料從一個型別轉換為另一個型別的一組公用程式方法。

span.span: Defines a set of utility methods that convert data from one type to another.

summary.span: 包含將值轉換成 物件的方法，讓偵錯工具可以顯示這些物件。

span.span: Includes methods that convert values to objects so that they can be displayed by the debugger.
